summary: KEY WOULD NOT GO INTO IGNITION. CALLED EMERGENCY ROAD SERVICE. THEY COULD NOT HELP.  THEY TOLD ME THIS WAS A COMMON PROBLEM AND THAT THEY WERE CONSIDERING A RECALL.  WITH ALL OF THE COMPLAINTS REGISTERED AND THE NUMBER OF ISSUES ON THE INTERNET, I AM SURPRISED IT HAS NOT BEEN DONE.  IGNITION ALREADY REPLACED ONCE.  THIS IS STARTING TO GET TO BE RIDICULOUS.  FINALLY TAPPED THE KEY IN THE CAR STARTS BUT THE KEY WILL NOT COME OUT OF THE IGNITION SWITCH RESULTING IN A SECURITY PROBLEM. *JB
